name: dux-wind
description: Real-time Tailwind-like CSS generator with pipe notation, shortcuts, and dynamic CSS injection

scripts.build: bun build src/dux-wind.js --outdir dist --format esm && bun build src/dux-wind.js --outdir dist --format cjs --outfile dist/dux-wind.cjs && bun build src/dux-wind-config.js --outdir dist --format esm && bun build src/dux-wind-config.js --outdir dist --format cjs --outfile dist/dux-wind-config.cjs
scripts.pages: echo 'GitHub Pages ready! Enable Pages in repo settings.' && echo 'Demo will be at: https://dux.github.io/dux-wind/'

author: Dux
